```go
type DownloadCommandResponse struct {
    CommandSuccess bool   `json:"commandSuccess,omitempty"`
    Error          string `json:"error,omitempty"`

    FileName string `json:"fileName,omitempty"`
    Url      string `json:"url,omitempty"`
}
```
